title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work consistently
description: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' functionality does not work reliably.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1. Close all open editors
2. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu

Nothing happens when the 'Close All Saved' option is selected.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all open editors should be closed, including the 'f1.txt' file.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Close all open editors in the software
2. Create a new file named 'f1.txt'
3. From the file menu, select 'Close All Saved'

Expected result: All open editors, including the 'f1.txt' file, should be closed.
